divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my back yard getting a quote from direct tv having a somke. Then while I was looking east at an 80 degree angle or so above me I saw what looked to be a flare. But it was too far up and traveled too far to be that. What I saw of it, it burned a bright deep green for 2-3 seconds. It traveled in a straight line. I think NNE to SSW. Then looked like it burned out. After it was over I looked around for a few seconds then ran up stairs to tell my girlfriend.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Belle Chasse
This sighting has never been favorited.
